languages.text: "Жизнью? О, если бы вы могли оказаться на моем месте и наблюдать этот калейдоскоп..." {n}Кассия устало прикрывает глаза.{/n} "Каждый голос — вспышка цвета. Каждый диалог — мерцающее сияние. Каждая ссора — безудержное мельтешение пестрых пятен..."

"With life? Oh, if only you could take my place and watch this kaleidoscope..." {n}Cassia rubs her eyes tiredly.{/n} "Every voice is a flash of colour, every conversation a shimmering glow. Every argument is an unstoppable swirl of gaudy splotches..."
languages.original_text: "Жизнью? О, если бы вы могли оказаться на моем месте и наблюдать этот калейдоскоп..." {n}Кассия устало прикрывает глаза.{/n} "Каждый голос — вспышка цвета. Каждый диалог — мерцающее сияние. Каждая ссора — безудержное мельтешение пестрых пятен..."

traits.locale_text: "With life? Oh, if only you could take my place and watch this kaleidoscope..." {n}Cassia rubs her eyes tiredly.{/n} "Each voice is a flash of color, each dialogue a shimmering glow. Each argument is an unstoppable swirl of gaudy speckles..."

"With life? Oh, if only you could take my place and watch this kaleidoscope..." {n}Cassia rubs her eyes tiredly.{/n} "Each voice is a flash of color, each dialogue a shimmering glow. Each argument is an unstoppable swirl of gaudy speckles..."

"With life? Oh, if only you could take my place and watch this kaleidoscope..." {n}Cassia rubs her eyes tiredly.{/n} "Every voice is a flash of color, every conversation a shimmering glow. Every argument is an unstoppable swirl of gaudy splotches..."

"With life? Oh, if only you could take my place and watch this kaleidoscope..." {n}Cassia rubs her eyes tiredly.{/n} "Every voice is a flash of color, every conversation a shimmering glow. Every argument is an unstoppable swirl of gaudy splotches..."

"With life? Oh, if only you could take my place and watch this kaleidoscope..." {n}Cassia rubs her eyes tiredly.{/n} "Every voice is a flash of colour, every conversation a shimmering glow. Every argument is an unstoppable swirl of gaudy splotches..."

languages.text: “充满了生机？噢，要是你能取代我的位置，亲眼看看这个万花筒就好了……”{n}卡西娅疲惫地揉了揉眼睛。{/n}“每个声音都是充满色彩的闪光，每次谈话都散发着耀眼的光芒，而每一次争论，都是一场光怪陆离的漩涡……”
languages.original_text: "With life? Oh, if only you could take my place and watch this kaleidoscope..." {n}Cassia rubs her eyes tiredly.{/n} "Every voice is a flash of colour, every conversation a shimmering glow. Every argument is an unstoppable swirl of gaudy splotches..."

traits.locale_text: “充满了生机？噢，要是你能取代我的位置，亲眼看看这个万花筒就好了……”{n}卡西娅疲惫地揉了揉眼睛。{/n}“每个声音都是充满色彩的闪光，每次谈话都散发着耀眼的光芒，而每一次争论，都是一场光怪陆离的漩涡……”

languages.original_text: "With life? Oh, if only you could take my place and watch this kaleidoscope..." {n}Cassia rubs her eyes tiredly.{/n} "Every voice is a flash of colour, every conversation a shimmering glow. Every argument is an unstoppable swirl of gaudy splotches..."

languages.text: «¿De vida? Ah, si pudiera ocupar mi puesto y ver este caleidoscopio...». {n}Cassia se frota los ojos, cansada.{/n} «Cada voz es un destello de color, cada conversación un brillo deslumbrante. Y las discusiones son remolinos de colores disonantes...».
languages.original_text: "With life? Oh, if only you could take my place and watch this kaleidoscope..." {n}Cassia rubs her eyes tiredly.{/n} "Every voice is a flash of colour, every conversation a shimmering glow. Every argument is an unstoppable swirl of gaudy splotches..."

traits.locale_text: «¿De vida? Ah, si pudiera ocupar mi puesto y ver este caleidoscopio...». {n}Cassia se frota los ojos, cansada.{/n} «Cada voz es un destello de color, cada conversación un brillo deslumbrante. Y las discusiones son remolinos de colores disonantes...».

languages.text: 「人生について？ああ、もしあなたが私の代わりにこの万華鏡を見てくれるなら…」{n}カシアは疲れたように目をこする。{/n}「すべての声は色の閃光、すべての会話はきらめく輝き。すべての口論は、まばゆき斑点の止められぬ渦…」
languages.original_text: "With life? Oh, if only you could take my place and watch this kaleidoscope..." {n}Cassia rubs her eyes tiredly.{/n} "Every voice is a flash of colour, every conversation a shimmering glow. Every argument is an unstoppable swirl of gaudy splotches..."

traits.locale_text: 「人生について？ああ、もしあなたが私の代わりにこの万華鏡を見てくれるなら…」{n}カシアは疲れたように目をこする。{/n}「すべての声は色の閃光、すべての会話はきらめく輝き。すべての口論は、まばゆき斑点の止められぬ渦…」

languages.text: "Mit Leben? Ach, könntet Ihr doch meinen Platz einnehmen und dieses Kaleidoskop erblicken ..." {n}Cassia reibt sich müde die Augen.{/n} "Jede Stimme ist ein Farbklecks, jedes Gespräch ein schimmerndes Leuchten. Jeder Streit ist ein unaufhörliches Wirbeln greller Farbflecken ..."
languages.original_text: "With life? Oh, if only you could take my place and watch this kaleidoscope..." {n}Cassia rubs her eyes tiredly.{/n} "Every voice is a flash of colour, every conversation a shimmering glow. Every argument is an unstoppable swirl of gaudy splotches..."

traits.locale_text: "Mit Leben? Ach, könntet Ihr doch meinen Platz einnehmen und dieses Kaleidoskop erblicken ..." {n}Cassia reibt sich müde die Augen.{/n} "Jede Stimme ist ein Farbklecks, jedes Gespräch ein schimmerndes Leuchten. Jeder Streit ist ein unaufhörliches Wirbeln greller Farbflecken ..."

languages.text: « De vie ? Oh, si seulement vous pouviez prendre ma place pour voir ce kaléidoscope... Chaque voix est un éclat de couleur ; chaque conversation, une lueur chatoyante, {n}explique Cassia en se frottant les yeux de fatigue.{/n} Et chaque dispute, un tourbillon d'éclaboussures criardes... »
languages.original_text: "With life? Oh, if only you could take my place and watch this kaleidoscope..." {n}Cassia rubs her eyes tiredly.{/n} "Every voice is a flash of colour, every conversation a shimmering glow. Every argument is an unstoppable swirl of gaudy splotches..."

traits.locale_text: « De vie ? Oh, si seulement vous pouviez prendre ma place pour voir ce kaléidoscope... Chaque voix est un éclat de couleur ; chaque conversation, une lueur chatoyante, {n}explique Cassia en se frottant les yeux de fatigue.{/n} Et chaque dispute, un tourbillon d'éclaboussures criardes... »

languages.text: "Renk mi? Keşke yer değişebilsek de bu renk cümbüşünü görebilsen..." {n}Cassia, gözlerini yorgun argın ovuşturuyor.{/n} "Konuşan herkes, ayrı bir renk ışıltısı... Her sohbet, ayrı bir parıltılı akkor... Her tartışma, ayrı bir durdurulmaz cırtlak leke fırtınası..."
languages.original_text: "With life? Oh, if only you could take my place and watch this kaleidoscope..." {n}Cassia rubs her eyes tiredly.{/n} "Every voice is a flash of colour, every conversation a shimmering glow. Every argument is an unstoppable swirl of gaudy splotches..."

traits.locale_text: "Renk mi? Keşke yer değişebilsek de bu renk cümbüşünü görebilsen..." {n}Cassia gözlerini yorgun argın ovuşturuyor.{/n} "Konuşan herkes, ayrı bir renk ışıltısı... Her sohbet, ayrı bir parıltılı akkor... Her tartışma, ayrı bir durdurulmaz cırtlak leke fırtınası..."
